User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the LandEase application.

uid.description: Unique identifier for the user, matching Firebase Auth UID.

displayName.description: The display name of the user.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the user was created.

pages.description: An array of page references owned by the user.

Page.title: Page
Page.description: Represents a single landing page created by a user.

userId.description: The UID of the user who owns this page.

pageName.description: The name of the landing page.

content.description: The JSON structure representing the page's components.

published.description: Indicates if the page is publicly accessible.

Submission.title: Submission
Submission.description: Represents a single form submission from a public page.

pageId.description: The ID of the page where the form was submitted.

pageName.description: The name of the page where the form was submitted.

formData.description: The data submitted through the form.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profiles, indexed by their unique Firebase Auth ID.

/pages/{pageId}.description: Stores all landing pages created by users. Private and editable by owners, but publicly readable if 'published' flag is true.

/pages/{pageId}/submissions/{submissionI.description: Stores form submissions for a specific page. Anyone can write to this collection.
